name: Amazing Garlic Chicken Livers
author: jchasko
summary: This is the ultimate garlic chicken liver recipe. Simple, quick, minimal ingredients, and low in carbs! The lemon, garlic, and liver flavors blend together to to make a surprisingly mild gourmet dish.
ingredients: 1 pound chicken livers - rinsed, trimmed, and patted dry
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Heat a skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir livers in the hot skillet until cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes
Add olive oil, lemon juice, and salt to livers; gently stir until mixed
Remove skillet from heat and sprinkle garlic over livers
